title: The Charm of 'The Idiot'
description: Elif Batuman talks about her first novel, “The Idiot,” and David Bellos discusses “The Novel of the Century: The Extraordinary Adventure of ‘Les Misérables.’ ”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
